title: Wavelengths of light from energy level diagram

content.question: The figure above shows a portion of the energy level diagram for hydrogen. Possible transitions among the energy levels are represented by arrows I, II, and III. Which of the following lists the transitions in order of their associated wavelengths of light, from shortest wavelength to longest wavelength?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
